description: man looking toward his PL, with face in profile, holding a small hatchet in his PL hand; man stands behind 3 white posts, extending upward toward UL and UR corners; curved white element in URC
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

on back of mount, in pencil and black ink: various notes and inscriptions

title: The Workman: Jaroslav Rossler
